acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accd. Jisoya champramary is acquitted .Accd. Mitinga Narzary is sentenced to undergo R.I for a period of seven years with a fine of Rs.10,000/- i.d 1 year R.I for the offence u/s.4 of Pocso Act.He is further sentenced to undergo R.I for a period of 2 years with a fine of Rs.2,000/- i.d 3 months R.I for the offence u/s 354 A I.P.C
